import './ExpenseItem.css' import ExpenseDate from "./ExpenseDate" import Card from "../UI/Card" import React, {useState} from 'react' let ExpenseItem = (props) => { const[title, setTitle]=useState(props.title); const onClickHandler =()=>{ setTitle("updated!!") } return (

{title}

${props.amount}
 ) } export default ExpenseItem
